text:
BITCOIN CRASH BATTERS EL SALVADOR, IMPERILS IMF DEAL

Bitcoin’s plunge has slashed the value of El Salvador’s holdings by roughly $300 million, exposing the risks of President Bukele’s crypto bet and shaking the country’s debt markets.

Despite the losses, Bukele keeps buying

*COINBASE: CUSTOMERS UNABLE TO BUY, SELL, TRANSFER AT THIS TIME

of course

I exercised caution on $BMNR for a while, anticipating the crypto winter that is now upon us… 

But with $ETH down substantially from the highs and the market exuberance flushing out, I believe the risk/reward has begun to shift into favor of the long term holder.

Today I
JUST IN: Coinbase says users currently unable to buy, sell, or transfer crypto.

Gold is crashing.

Silver is crashing.

Crypto is crashing.

Stocks are crashing.

The dollar is crashing.

Genuinely what should we buy now?

Palantir CEO Alex Karp on @michaeljburry’s Palantir and Nvidia short:

“As far as I can tell, the two companies he’s shorting are the ones making all the money which is super weird.”

“The idea that Chips and Ontology is what you want to short is— batshit crazy.”
If you bought Bitcoin in February 2021 you would be up 15% in 5 years. Someone buying US treasuries outperformed you..
BREAKING: Coinbase, $COIN, says many users currently unable to buy, sell, or transfer crypto.
BREAKING: Coinbase Users Currently Unable to Buy, Sell, or Transfer Crypto Due to Platform Issues.

One of my bottom signals just triggered.

Ben McKenzie is showing his face again after getting rekt shorting Bitcoin last cycle. 

Dude literally hasn’t tweeted in years and only shows up when Bitcoin is crashing.

I will lay this out simply. When Bitcoin bounces, everything will go ballistic to the upside. The name of the game in this is to stay positioned. Be prepared to hold for a few weeks to a few months, adding if you can. It’s really that simple. I’ve been doing this for a long time.
the pam bondi dow clip makes me want to sell every risk asset i own and go live off the land in the woods until i die

BREAKING: 

Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong sold 1.5M+ Coinbase shares worth about $550M.
